title: How We Got Here # 9: The Early 1990's (Nirvana, LA Riots, Camille Paglia, Supermodels, Feminism)
description:
In the early 1990s what was underground in the 1980s was now above Ground. In this episode of How We Got Here we explore Nirvana and the Alternative scene, Grunge, Noise, Tattoos, Body Modification, Gangsta Rap, the LA Riots, Angry Women, Camille Paglia, Supermodels, Kate Moss, D.I.Y.  Culture, Extreme Culture and Extreme Knowledge, Zines, Alt Comics, and more. Come with me as we confront the climatic end of the 20th Century from the underside. 

Since this is another long chapter in our historical saga here are some timestamps for the different sections. You can take as much or little as you want when you want it.

00:00 Preview & Title
01:45 Prologue
11:00 Introduction
22:45 Nirvana
30:00 Grunge, Alternative, Noise, Whatever
48:00 Gangsta Rap
58:20 L.A. Riots & O.J. Simpson
01:15:15 Angry Women (Camille Paglia)
01:31:35 Supermodels
01:48:10 Body Modification
01:56:10 Extreme Culture
02:06:00 Performance Art
02:15:10 The Cinema Of Transgression
02:23:05 D.I.Y.
02:26:45 The End Of An Era
02:41:40 Conclusions

''''''''

Thanks for watching, more coming soon!
